conditions.name: Type 1 Diabetes
conditions.suggestion: Insulin therapy, blood sugar monitoring, carb counting, regular exercise, proper diet.

conditions.name: Type 2 Diabetes
conditions.suggestion: Medication, blood sugar monitoring, diet control, exercise, weight management.

conditions.name: Hypothyroidism
conditions.suggestion: Thyroid hormone replacement therapy, regular monitoring, healthy lifestyle.

conditions.name: Hyperthyroidism
conditions.suggestion: Anti-thyroid medications, beta blockers, radioactive iodine therapy if needed.

conditions.name: Addison's Disease
conditions.suggestion: Hormone replacement therapy, stress dose steroids during illness, medical ID bracelet.
